title: Sticky marmalade duck
time: Hands-on time 10 min, oven time 8-10 min, plus resting
description: Don’t have time to make duck à l’orange? Try this Chinese-style cheat’s version of sticky marmalade duck that only needs five ingredients.
ingredients: A small bag of herb leaf salad

method.Step 1: Preheat the oven to 220°C/fan200°C/gas 7. Slash the skin of the duck breasts in a criss-cross pattern, season and sear in a hot frying pan over a high heat for 2 min each side.

method.Step 2: Meanwhile, in a small roasting tin, mix the marmalade, soy sauce and sesame seeds. Add the duck and turn to coat.

method.Step 3: Roast for 8-10 min in the oven, until golden and still a little pink in the middle. Rest for 5 min, then thickly slice.

method.Step 4: Divide the salad between 2 shallow bowls, top with the duck and drizzle over the pan juices. Serve with orange wedges, if you like.
